channel.title: Error
channel.description:
When I run the server it runs but this come comes up
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:58) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:73) I was editing the npc drops... and server.java but it compiled perfectly.

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @darrenshan darrenshan
item.description:
@darrenshan wrote:

Thanks for being so noob-friendly and not screeching but I’ve checked them and to make my life easier I replaced all the spaces with _ so If i ever press space incase of tab I can quickly search for the space but I’ve looked all three rows, nothing wrong.

Read full topic

code
(NPCDrops.java:15)
(Server.java:73)[/code]

Look at those rows to see if there is anything wrong.

[/quote]
In the NPC drops.tsm. :|[/quote]
